NormalAlgorithmToolTip.Text: Wähle den Alforithmus zur Berechnung der Knotennormalen.

SmoothCheckBoxToolTip.Text: Das Modell wird unter Verwendung der Knotennormalen gezeichnet.

SolidCheckBoxToolTip.Text: Die Dreiecke werden als Flächen gezeichnet.

MeshCheckBoxToolTip.Text: Die Kanten werden als Linien gezeichnet.

VerticesCheckBoxToolTip.Text: Die Knoten werden als Punkte gezeichnet.

TriangleNormalsCheckBoxToolTip.Text: Die Dreiecksnormalen werden als Linien gezeichnet.

VertexNormalsCheckBoxToolTip.Text: Die Knotennormalen werden als Linien gezeichnet.

XAxisCheckBoxToolTip.Text: Die X-Achse wird als Linie gezeichnet.

YAxisCheckBoxToolTip.Text: Die Y-Achse wird als Linie gezeichnet.

ZAxisCheckBoxToolTip.Text: Die Z-Achse wird als Linie gezeichnet.

PickingModeComboBoxToolTip.Text: Keine Auswahl, Knoten, Kanten oder Dreiecks Auswahl.

ObjParser.ObjHeader: # Written by the TriMM ObjParser (by Christian Moritz)

OffParser.OffHeader: # Written by the TriMM OffParser (by Christian Moritz)

PlyParser.PlyBrokenFileError: The file is not a PLY file, or it is broken!
PlyParser.PlyTriangleError: At least one of the faces is not a triangle!
PlyParser.PlyHeader: comment Written by the TriMM PlyParser (by Christian Moritz)

Settings.NAError: Only the numbers 0 to 12 are allowed for the normal algorithm setting!
Settings.PICKError: The picking mode (PICK) must be either 0, 1, 2 or 3!
Settings.SMOOTHError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the SMOOTH setting!
Settings.SOLIDError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the SOLID setting!
Settings.MESHError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the MESH setting!
Settings.VERTError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the VERT setting!
Settings.TRINORMError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the TRINORM setting!
Settings.VERTNORMError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the VERTNORM setting!
Settings.XAXISError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the XAXIS setting!
Settings.YAXISError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the YAXIS setting!
Settings.ZAXISError: Only the values 0 and 1 are allowed for the ZAXIS setting!
Settings.SETBrokenFileError: This Settings file is broken or not a TriMM-Settings file at all!
Settings.SETHeader: # Settings for TriMM, the TriangleMesh Manipulator

LoadSettingsToolTip.Text: Load the settings from a .SET file.

SaveSettingsToolTip.Text: Save the settings to a .SET file.

MakeStandardToolTip.Text: Accept the current settings as standard.

ColorComboBoxToolTip.Text: Choose the part whose color you want to change.

ColorTextBoxToolTip.Text: The floating point RGB values of the color.

TriMMControl.HandleCreatedError: The control's window handle has not been created!
TriMMControl.DeviceContextCreationError: Unable to create an OpenGL device context!
TriMMControl.PixelFormatError: Unable to find a suitable pixel format!
TriMMControl.PixelFormatSetError: Unable to set the requested pixel format!
TriMMControl.RenderingContextCreationError: Unable to create an OpenGL rendering context!
TriMMControl.MakeCurrentContextError: Unable to activate this control's OpenGL rendering context!
TriMMControl.PaintError: No device or rendering context available!

ClipppingPlaneToolTip.Text: Moves the clipping plane. 1.1 is in the back, -1.1 is in the front.

ObservedToolTip.Text: The index of the observed Vertex, Edge or Triangle. -1 means nothing is selected.

RadiusToolTip.Text: Radius of the sphere around the observed Vertex. The radius of the cylinder around the observed Edge is 1/10 of that value.

ScreenshotButtonToolTip.Text: Makes a screenshot (png, bmp or jpg) of the scene.

OpenMenuItemToolTip.Text: Load a TriangleMesh from a file (.OBJ, .OFF, .PLY, .STL).

SaveMenuItemToolTip.Text: Save the TriangleMesh to a file (.OBJ, .OFF, .PLY, .STL).

ViewMenuItemToolTip.Text: Show the visualization of the TriangleMesh.

VerticesTextBoxToolTip.Text: Shows the number of Vertices in the TriangleMesh.

EdgesTextBoxToolTip.Text: Shows the number of Edges in the TriangleMesh.

TrianglesTextBoxToolTip.Text: Shows the number of Triangles in the TriangleMesh.

RemoveSinglesButtonToolTip.Text: Removes all Vertices that do not belong to any Triangle.

RemoveDoubleVertButtonToolTip.Text: Removes duplicates of Vertices and adjusts the Triangles.

RemoveObservedButtonToolTip.Text: Removes the Vertex picked in the visualization.

AddVertexButtonToolTip.Text: Adds the Vertex determined by the coordinates chosen above.

MoveObservedButtonToolTip.Text: Moves the Vertex picked in the visualization to the coordinates chosen above.

TransposeVertexButtonToolTip.Text: Moves the Vertex picked in the visualization by adding the coordinates chosen above to it's position.

MoveAlongNormalButtonToolTip.Text: Moves the Vertex picked in the visualization by the value selected below along its normal vector.

DistanceLabelToolTip.Text: The distance to move the Vertex.

FlipEdgeButtonToolTip.Text: Flips the selected Edge connecting the opposite corners of the incident Triangles instead.

SubdivideEdgeButtonToolTip.Text: Subdivides the Edge picked in the visualization by connecting the midege Vertex to the opposite corners of the incident Triangles.

RemoveEdgeButtonToolTip.Text: Removes the Edge picked in the visualization.

RemoveColinButtonToolTip.Text: Removes all Triangles that have three colinear Vertices.

FlipAllTrianglesButtonToolTip.Text: Changes the orientation and thus the direction of the normal vector for all Triangles.

FlipObservedTriangleButtonToolTip.Text: Changes the orientation and thus the direction of the normal vector for the Triangle picked in the visualization.

SubdivideMeshButtonToolTip.Text: Subdivides all Triangles by connecting the midege Vertices. 4 new Triangle for every Triangle.

SubdivideTriangleButtonToolTip.Text: Subdivides the Triangle picked in the visualization by connecting the midege Vertices. 4 new Triangle for every Triangle.

RemoveTriangleButtonToolTip.Text: Removes the Triangle determined by the Vertex-indices selected above.

AddTriangleButtonToolTip.Text: Adds the Triangle determined by the Vertex-indices selected above.

Vector.DotProductError: The vectors need to be of equal length for the dot product!
Vector.CrossProductError: The cross product is only defined for 3D vectors!
Vector.LengthError: The vectors need to be of equal length!
Vector.DivisionByZeroError: Vectors are not dividible by zero!
